They also voted against undoing Trump's tariffs.  Took Vance's vote to get this done, too, since McConnell is apparently still too afraid of Trump to show up in opposition.  Yet they still want to blame the WORST economy since Trump's last term on BIDEN.  If they're going to force Trump blunders down our throats, these weasels could AT LEAST take responsibility for the mess they're making.   MIDTERMS CAN'T COME SOON ENOUGH!
Maybe this is a stupid question, but...  How much thinly disguised malfeasance have so many Republicans been engaging in that Trump has so much leverage over their votes?
What do you expect from the Klan?

Let me add the rest of what should have been in the headline: “without due process."   And there it is. There's the actual endgame.    Here in Alabama, one of our state legislators just presented a bill to move inmates imprisoned in Alabama to overseas prisons. He knew it wouldn't pass this session, because it's too late in the session. (Read: He didn't say it wouldn't pass because members would vote it down.) It was clearly a message to the people, as he said it was, as well as a test run to gauge public outrage.    Trump has already floated the idea.    I'm curious now as to how many other states have seen ideas like this being floated around.    The administration has learned that there are no legal consequences to having masked mystery men snatch people off the street, even if they're getting the wrong target, and tossing them into an unmarked van and never allowing them to contact a relative or lawyer. They've learned that all they need to do is get someone out of the country quickly enough to suspend their constitutional rights.    Why in the fucking fuckity fuck would anyone even come close to thinking that this would stop at illegal immigrants and/or criminals? It shouldn't have even started there, and this right here is why.
Stop calling it deporting. You cannot deport a US Citizen. This is called *Trafficking*. Our government is engaged in human trafficking of its citizens.
This is crazy.  Deport them to where? They’re US Citizens…
What gets me is that these clowns know they are in the wrong but have zero spine, zero self respect, and zero dignity.
Deporting indicates a legal process, these people are being kidnapped and human trafficked.
I can’t wait until these plans are used to deport MAGA criminals in a few years, and their tweets of support can be shown to them in court before their flights to Rwanda.
